definitions: denoting or relating to a part of a bone forming a crest or ridge, especially along the edge of the jaw around the crowns of the teeth

examples.text: the earliest radiographic sign of periodontitis is loss of definition of crestal bone

shortDefinitions: denoting part of bone forming crest or ridge

definitions: denoting or relating to the crest of a mountain or hill

examples.text: the well is located in a crestal position
